mapper.select: SELECT c.sa_lev FROM sm_program a JOIN sm_prog_authority b ON a.p_idx = b.p_idx JOIN sm_sys_authority c ON b.sa_idx = c.sa_idx WHERE a.p_url LIKE CONCAT('%',#{str},'%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sm_member a JOIN sm_user_authority b ON a.m_idx = b.m_idx WHERE a.m_id = #{str} AND b.ua_crud_flag = 'Y'
